    • Constructor Detail

      • ClothesService

        public ClothesService(Sql2o currDb)
               throws ClothesService.ClothesServiceException
        Construct the model with a pre-defined datasource. The current implementation also ensures that the DB schema is created if necessary.
        Parameters:
        currDb - the sq2o object containing the connection to the database.
        Throws:
        ClothesService.ClothesServiceException

        Parameters:
        currUserId - the id of the user.

      • addClothing

        public static void addClothing(java.lang.String type,
                               java.lang.String[] specificType,
                               int currUserId)
                        throws ClothesService.ClothesServiceException
        Adds a specific type of default clothing values for a user into the backend db.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of clothing item [top, pants, outerwear, footwear, accesory].
        specificType - an array of the specific types of clothing.
        currUserId - the id corresponding to the user.
        Throws:
        ClothesService.ClothesServiceException

                                                                           throws ClothesService.ClothesServiceException

      • updateCloset

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> updateCloset(java.lang.String id,
                                                                          java.lang.String body)
                                                                   throws ClothesService.ClothesServiceException,
                                                                          ClothesService.InvalidInputException
        Updates the number of items owned for a specific user.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the user.
        body - the json form containing all clothes and their counts, {type: x, number: y}.
        Returns:
        a map of the new counts for all items.
        Throws:
        ClothesService.ClothesServiceException
        ClothesService.InvalidInputException

                                                                           java.lang.String body)
                                                                    throws ClothesService.ClothesServiceException,
                                                                           ClothesService.InvalidInputException
        Updates the number of items dirty for a specific user.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the user.
        body - the json form containing all clothes and their updates.
        Returns:
        a map of the new counts of dirty items for all items.
        Throws:
        ClothesService.ClothesServiceException
        ClothesService.InvalidInputException

      • markDirty

        public boolean markDirty(int currId,
                         java.lang.String body)
                  throws ClothesService.ClothesServiceException
        Marks the items as dirty.
        Parameters:
        currId - the id of the user.
        body - the json form of the items to be marked dirty, {top: a, pants: b, footwear: c, accessory: d, outerwear: e}.
        Returns:
        true if the user should do laundry, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        ClothesService.ClothesServiceException

        Parameters:
